name: sf-preferences
description: Library to easily manage SimpliField preferences.

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- --compilers js:babel/register src/*.mocha.js -R spec -t 5000 && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.cover: istanbul cover --report html _mocha -- --compilers js:babel/register src/*.mocha.js -R spec -t 5000

author: Nicolas Froidure (Simplifield)
